Name: Get MassList MetaData
Description: Pushes HMDB_ID from hits in HMDB mass lists to Compound table

ScriptProcessorArguments.RequestedTablesAndColumns: Compounds: Formula; Mass List Search Results: Formula, HMDB_ID

Parameters.Name: Example switch
Parameters.Description: If set to True, nothing happens.

Parameters.Name: PPM
Parameters.Description: Mass Tolerance used for PPM_CHECK column
